selected_quotes: Last publication in JACS from the catalys and engineering team at IRCELYON Enantiopure Peptide-Functionalized #MOFs
Last publication in JACS from the catalys and engineering team at IRCELYON #MOFs Enantiopure Peptide-Functionalized
@J_A_C_S Check out our last publication in JACS #MOFs Enantiopure Peptide-Functionalized MOFs

citation.abstract: We present herein the first example of Metal-Organic Frameworks post-functionalized with peptides. Our microwave-assisted post-synthetic modification method yields enantiopure peptides anchored inside MOF cavities. Al-MIL-101-NH2, In-MIL-68-NH2 and Zr-UiO-66-NH2 were chosen as starting platforms. A single amino acid and various oligopeptides are grafted with yields up to 60% after a 30-minutes microwave-assisted coupling-deprotection sequence. This allows efficient preparation of a library of functional hybrid solids for molecular recognition applications such as sensing, separation or asymmetric catalysis, as demonstrated here for the chiral aldol reaction.
citation.journal: Journal of the American Chemical Society
citation.title: Enantiopure Peptide-Functionalized Metal–Organic Frameworks
